alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 2:29PM EDT until October 01 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting Fairfield and New Haven Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:46 PM EDT Friday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 1 pm: 14.0 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 15.1 Sat 2 am 15.2 Sat 8 am 12.5 Sat 2 pm 12.5 Sat 8 pm 11.4 Sun 2 am 11.4 Sun 8 am 11.4 Sun 2 pm 10.3 Sun 8 pm 10.3 Mon 2 am 10.2 Mon 8 am 10.2 &&
